summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackCurlsmith Invincible Volume Hair Mousse is a lightweight gel-to-mousse that will create soft, long-lasting voluminous curls & definition all day long
details: DetailsBenefitsThis one-of-a-kind non-drying styling mousse gives long lasting hold and definition without drying alcohol.A mousse with the definition and hold of a gel and the lightweight feel of a mousseLong lasting volume - Up to 72hrs*3 times more volume*86% said their hair looked thicker and fuller, without compromising their curls***Based on third party testing**Based on an independent study on wavy, curly, coily hair.FeaturesBEST FOR: Flat dull curlsFORMAT: SprayHOLD LEVEL: 6- Medium holdColor-SafeMade without sulphates, silicones or drying alcoholsItem 2643515How To UseApply to wet hair. Start with a dollop of product. Rake through to ensure you are evenly coating all strands. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Isobutane, Polyimide-1, Heptyl Glucoside, C14-22 Alcohols, Stearic Acid, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Tilia Tomentosa Bud Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Lamium Album Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Pinus Sylvestris Bud Extract, Nasturtium Officinale Extract, Arctium Majus Root Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Extract, Hedera Helix (Ivy) Leaf Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Tropaeolum Majus Flower Extract, Cyclodextrin, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol, Phytic Acid, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Citric Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Xylitol, Caprylic Acid, Glycerin, Castor Oil Propanediol Esters, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Polyquaternium-28, Propanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Chloride, Hydrogen Peroxide, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal, Geranyl Acetate, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Rose Ketones, Vanillin.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Start with a dollop of product. Rake through to ensure you are evenly coating all strands. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.
